snippet: The Mets will hand out bobblehead dolls for the public relations man Jay Horwitz on Aug. 23, two nights before they hold the same promotion for Hall of Famer Tom Seaver.
abstract: The Mets will hand out bobblehead dolls for the public relations man Jay Horwitz on Aug. 23, two nights before they hold the same promotion for Hall of Famer Tom Seaver.

headline.main: A Seaver Bobblehead Sure, but One for Horwitz?
